p: In the present study, we selected a panel of Cameroonian medicinal and aromatic plants as potential sources of anti-trypanocidal compounds. We focused on Azadirachta indica A. Juss (Meliaceae), Aframomum melegueta K. Schum. (Zingiberaceae), Aframomum daniellii (Hook. F.) K. Schum. (Zingiberaceae), Clausena anisata (Willd.) Hook.f. ex Benth. (Rutaceae), Dichrostachys cinerea (L.) Wight and Arn. (Mimosaceae), and Echinops giganteus A. Rich. (Asteraceae).
